1.73:
- Make website localization data independent of external JSON for easier maintenance

- Scripts support internationalization while using crowdin platform to automate localization efforts

- Replace some buttons with icon buttons

- Add support for DeepL API, including official api-free, api-pro and deeplx, thanks to @Vistarin for the suggestion

- Add support for support for deepl and chatgpt configuration balance query, note that this also requires your service provider to support and provide the corresponding API

- Add support for pre-translated text, if it looks like a code snippet, it won't be translated automatically, and there will be a popup window to remind you of this before clicking Translate

- Add the function of selecting the target language of the translation service

- Add the about page, and the options of updating the channel and the source of the update

- Add the debugging maintenance page, including cache refresh, data clear, import and export

- Add customization optionsï¼š 'Code editor submit button position', default is at the bottom, thanks to @lishufood's suggestion

- Improve each loading function, remove some unnecessary waiting relationships, speed up the script loading time

- Improve the translation function's related methods, and the display of error messages

- Improve the performance of auto-translation, and the problem that auto-translation may not be possible

- Improve the code related to the online running of code samples

- Improve the method of comparing the difference of the running results, codeDiff()

- Improve the dialog window as the background content is no longer scrolled along with the mouse

- Improve the style of the code editor when it is fixed to the right side, the bottom, and the full screen, thanks to @lishufood's suggestion. Thanks to @lishufood for the suggestion

- Improved display of .html2md-panel panel in simple mode

- Improved styling of configuration page in settings panel

- Fixed acmsguru title page editor error

- Fixed issue with issue page code editor after switching between mobile/desktop version of site

- Fixed getMarkdown() method that incorrectly stores data directly into the DOM, resulting in page performance degradation

- Fix translation buttons in the collapsed block not displaying after turning off 'Collapsed block auto-expand', thanks to @MoYuToGo

- Since the "Don't wait for page resources to fully load" option has theoretically been disabled " option is theoretically meaningless, renamed to uncheck the previously possible state

- Lots of code structure tweaks

- **Lots of css class renaming, so may need to be tweaked if you're using stylus custom styles**

- Some other tweaks and improvements
1.72:
- Fix ChatGPT configuration panel not showing, thanks to @caoxuanming for the feedback

- Add a configuration switch "Mouse Scroll Lock", on by default, thanks to @liuhao6 for the suggestion
1.71:
- Update API for clist rating to v4, adjust the data fetching method of title page to fetch via API, thanks to @wrkwrk for the suggestion

- Add ChatGPT Translation "Streaming" option, on by default

- Fix Google Translate result is empty Thanks to @ shicxin's feedback

- Add a configure switch "whether to confirm code submission twice", on by default Thanks to @Rikkual's suggestion

- Add a small area button in the full topic set page

- Fix the problem that the translation result is not shown when the full topic set page is right-clicked to print Thanks to @zfs732 for his feedback!
